text:
Welp, nearly drank myself out of money and probably going to spend my last few dollars on some 3 dollar pint of swill. I just don't care anymore. I hope I get so drunk I choke in my sleep and never have to wake up into this fucking shit world again.
Not like anyone's gonna read this or even give a fuck. We're all just screaming into the void.
I'm a failure and I'll never be normal.

Checking in : I hear that being super kind and nice will make you feel things . Especially when depressed . Hoping that my kindness takes me somewhere, I feel so empty and lost . Like a lost cause . I’ve been a lighting rod for anger for so long I’ve felt cold and I’ve felt heartless and that leads me nowhere so I’m hoping this will help .

Checking in: I just live in such a disgusting home. It is in such disrepair and the landlord wont help. My carpet is so dusty and 1k is how much tile cost. I'm 100k in debt. Credit card debt,  medical, have no job to even pay rent. 
My apartment is barely even 10 ft by 30 ft any way. 
My dreams are dead. All of them. 
I am a millenial and just waking up is so hard. Just getting out of bed is so so so very unrewarding. 
Want to sleep forever honestly. 
It's supposed to be christmas and I'm getting a vaccuum cleaner and nothing else. I just really am happy I am checking in in the morning. Bc I'm being made to wake up.
What for?

Rn im just trying to get by. I'm so stressed, stuff kinda sucks. Money is always a problem, I feel like I'm constantly wrecking my relationships and pushing people away, which enables straight up loneliness
Working too many hours but it is never paying off because in every part of my life I'm just trying to make up ground and get back to 0. I've been negative for so long I'm so comfortable being negative, even being at 0 would be a breath of fresh air right now. Makes it hard to get up in the morning, really
Does your birthday cause anyone else to have an episode? I know I shouldn’t be feeling so crappy about it but I just can’t shake it off.
Others were recommended to join this sub them relating to a post over on r/introvert that was obviously not an only introvert problem. Decided I should too after reading some of the comments.
Late night thoughts and rumination. Wish I can do more. :']

Hi everyone I have my first meeting with a counsellor tomorrow morning and i'm feeling very anxious about it. I'v been feeling low for a few years now but only managed to see my G.P. three months ago and have been on a waiting list since. Can anyone tell me what it's going to be like?

People always lie and they’re never accountable for anything they do or say. 
They always make excuses for everything they do. They tell me that I shouldn’t make excuses but that does not apply to them. They get to live a happy life and I don’t because I’m horrible and I deserve eternal suffering. 
They will always lie. Always. They think I’m a nightmare and they think I’m disgusting. They lie to your face and be nice but behind your back they will destroy you. And it’s funny to them.

So many people in my life going through something. Somethings of varying degrees, but all equally important. Made me realize people need someone to listen to them. I try my best to be that for everyone that comes to me looking to talk, but it's hard to balance their problems and try to deal with my own problems all in my head. I care about and worry about everyone in my life, but I can't play therapist when I think about ending my shit every damn day. 
I try my hardest to stay positive and be grateful, but it's hard to not see how messed up the world can be.

Headache…six hours…plus I feel like I am delusional after talking with my father yesterday, since clearly he knows better and I know nothing. I had to get rid of a painting because he keeps thinking and telling me that it’s influencing my depression. I. Got. It. Because. I. Thought. It. Was. Cool. I keep saying to myself that I should stay away from people because I’m this delusional problematic ungrateful person, I wanted to tell my friends that “hey, maybe what my dad says about me is right, you probably shouldn’t be friends with me because I am no good.” Even after I move out of my parents house, my father is still probably going to control my life, cuz I can’t make my own decisions and decide what makes me happy because I have depression and anxiety. I’m too mentally ill to say anything.

Your dad sounds like an abusive walking L with no idea how to actually help for as much as he insists on controlling your actions. I don't have an easy straightforward answer for any of the awful things you're feeling, but it sounds like you are dealing with some actual external bullshit on top of everything.

My job drags me down so much, so tired of asking for guidance and getting a half ass effort from supervisors but then they'll be on my ass about assignments that theyve assigned me and Ive already finished. Just really debilitating and kills my self worth when it feels like no one listens to you
My dog of 10 years just passed away. He just waited for me and greeted me one last time just as I came home. Fucking shit man, just when I have been turning things around.
I hate that I catch feelings so quickly, I feel like such an idiot for thinking someone might actually be interested in me.

Me: I know I’ve been limiting my speaking output lately but I still need to shut up more often.
Also me: Then you shouldn’t have written this in the first place.

i'm so tired of pretending everything is okay or pushing my sadness aside. i keep a happy, "stable"  mask on because my parents already have a lot of problems to deal with and they say that i just add onto their issues whenever i express my feelings. i'm exhausted
i'm such a fucking screw up and a failure can someone just fucking hit me with a bus already. why am i even here?
Isolated myself from everyone apart from my family for the past 3 years. And today I'm feeling so hurt that I've avoided my online friends too. I just wish I could stop existing in my sleep.
I wish I wasn't alone right now, I just want to be hugged and told that I matter.

You matter. Every life on this world matters. All of us can take one but none can give one so that's why life is important. You may be alone now but time can and will change everything but you also have just give a little bit of your strenght to achieve that. I don't know you and I won't ever but I can tell you I have seen hell but I was able to get out of there. Hope exists but in this state none of us can see the bright future that awaits them.
I feel so empty and dead. I'm so lonely but can't connect with anyone. Can't even pretend long enough to. I honestly just want to fucking die. I hate myself.

I don't and will never know exactly how you feel but I probably and still expirience many of the things you go through. There is always somewhere help and people who might be able to help you on a professional level. If you can seek them out. Hating yourself gets no one anything. There are so many more people that have done far worse than you, all the child molesters, the murderer, the people who have lied and broken the hearts of others. Hate these criminals that have hurt others but not yourself. I can't help you much but I do want to let you know that there is hope but most of us can't see it when we are in our lowest times. You have cone this far and that is a achievement many others weren't able to get.

All people hate me. Everyone. They lied to me and they don’t want me there. They fucking lied to me. Why can’t someone be honest? I tried to be nice but it never fucking matters. Everyone is a fucking cockroach.

I have expirienced similiar things. I had a friend for 2 years I considered him to be my best friend. He bullied me, beat me up, abused me and gave me so many things that still haunt me till this day. Today I have some real good friends who have helped me through some of my hardest times. Nice people will eventually find other nice people that's just how the world works. Be careful but don't forget how to trust someone.
People are always awful. If you try to be nice to them, they will hurt you because they are awful. That’s what people do all the time.
spiraled three times this week and wanted to kill myself i can’t

i wanted to make a post asking for advice on how can i keep my dental hygine good because im trying to do that now, im scared of loosing my teeth and fucking up my gums. but i am concerned it breaks rule 10 
  whos the mod i contact to ask for permission?  i hope its okay that i ask here

well part of the issue is im not always able to get up every day and all… like, not for advice in genral in regards of dental care, i mean advice on what other peoole do to take care of their mouth dispite being depressed or having other mental illnesses
for example if i forget to brush my teeth i eat gum or i will eat it after meals to feel fresher or if i don’t have energy sometimes i will just mouth wash
like stuff like that
 thank you for trying to help even though thats not what i was asking
just about most of what you said i alr know tho but yeah cus thats not what i was asking
Not much in the mood of hating myself today but I surely deserve some self hatred at the moment. More of the healthy kind hopefully.

Today, well i didnt do much today, and my dad yelled at me for not giving my sister's kid fruit. Tbh his mom didnt even give him fruit. Also i didnt know there was fruit in the house. Then i was yelled at for not making a list of things for the house. I asked for two things long ago and tbh i shouldnt have to make a list. If they use something then they should remember to write it down as empty. Im no ones mother. Im getting blamed for alot of things and it doesn't help my mental health. Tbh i have been feeling crap and this only makes me wish i wasnt here or that i could live far far away and never look back. #thisisntmyhome it never was.
I think one of the mental health effects of depression for me is that I cannot conceive in my head that someone would love or even like me. Why would someone want to be with me with my mental health?

Almost didn't leave bed today. Feel like I have nobody left. Sometimes I wonder if I exist, due to the # of texts and emails I've sent that haven't been acknowledged. Realized I didn't take my meds for a while... Took the one I thought was helping most before I went out and got food and I'll try to remember the others before bed tonight. But honestly, I was debating between that and a whole bottle of Tylenol.

I need help. I feel like i’ve lost all my friends and i don’t know what i did wrong. There’s a gc with all my friends in it, and we all used to talk all the time. But something changed, no one talks to me anymore and they make plans to hangout with telling me. Maybe i’m being dramatic, but i don’t think they care about me anymore

I don't want to eat or play video games or do work today. I don't even want Indian food. Spent like 40 minutes in the washroom today just looking at the mirror thinking about my future. I think it's just because it's a cloudy day. Fuck.
I’m tired of being alive. I am tired of living and being such a mess. I’m so sick of myself. I don’t want to be awake. I just want to die.
Pls give me motivation. Please. I’m such a mess.

I got called a beaner by a friend of a friend( im Mexican, the friend’s friend is Italian) i didn’t know what how to tell him i wasn’t okay with that, it was on FaceTime and he’s one of those guys who thinks making racist jokes is edgy and cool. That’s not the problem, because of my depression I’ve never felt I can tell someone my problems because I don’t want to pull them under my dark cloud, which I feel everyone can see. So I just internalized my anger at this dude for 2 days and now it just came out. I came out the shower so angry thinking about how I didn’t say shit to this guy and that it’s my parents fault I can’t stand up for myself, that I was literally muttering curse words under my breath like a homeless psycho. I pass my mom in the hallway and she asks how I am ( it’s just me and my mom in a small house, my dad cheated on her so she got the house in the divorce), I say “great” in a mean tone. I get in my room and start kicking my bed and just basically yeah obscenities and nasty mean things. My mom and I have been having problems, so she thinks im saying this about her, and they partly were geared towards because I know I can be a asshole to her and she kinda just has to deal with it. She come screaming in my room, like loud and angry, and I just stand there thinking these horrible thoughts about her, she leave then I kick the door hard right after she shuts it, come in screaming louder and angrier saying I have to be out in 30 days. And now I’m here typing about it. If I wasn’t such a depressed loser and said something to this Italian boy I don’t think I would be taking it out on my mom. But I hate that I’ve become this person, I hate myself so much for hurting my mom and my dad and letting other people hurt me. I want to be different, I don’t want to die but I see no purpose to trying to be better, I truly believe I’ll just be this depressed loser who let’s people walk over him and then takes his anger out on the wrong people. What type of life is that? I feel like death is my only option. Anyways it’s nice to put this somewhere, I definitely can’t tell my friends about this.

Tired of trying to make an effort anymore. I don't have a place to live and I'm staying with my parents and it makes want to die in all kinds of possible ways. I want it to be over and have never happened. Thinking about jumping off a tall building is now thinking about cutting open arteries with plate shears. Such progress!
I don't want help anymore I don't want friends i don't want the notion of them I don't want parents i don't want siblings I don't want partners i don't want love i don't want lust or sex or hugs I don't want anyone to feel the pain I don't want knowledge i don't want intelligence I don't want to know I'm alive I don't want to be alive I want to be already dead and doing nothing in the big nothing I don't want anything anymore except to have my brain ice cream-scooped out of the cavity and into somewhere where it makes sense for it to be. Yuck
thinking of just downing my whole bottle of blood pressure meds and going to sleep forever

lol ok so i found out my so-called friend unfollowed me on twitter not like i use it a lot, but i was like ???? i know i posted about wanting to kill myself and shit but instead of actually caring, they just unfollow 
lmao like fuck everyone i already hate myself and my life so much like why

two people have told me that i’m the problem because i treat my friends badly and i hope i don’t? one of my closest friends stopped talking to me even tho i reached out multiple times to check in and try to catch up. i’ve been wanting to kill myself on the daily and have been asking friends for support but now i don’t even know why i bother. i just want to die and end this shit because i spend all of my time alone anyway and i want this to be over forever. i hate my life and i hate myself
I want to die haha

I feel like if my parents won't let me get the haircut, I want I will just lose hope for finding happiness. I am 19 years old and my hair still doesn't belong to me. I can't just up and move out because I'm fully dependent on them...I know this cut will make me happy but I'm just being too ridiculous and bratty about it. I just want to fucking die. I wish I'd die in my sleep tonight. I want to die.

You can move out. You can cut your hair the way you want. Your parents may fuss a little that you are asserting yourself by deciding things in you life but they will respect you. It took me a long time to realize that I can do whatever I wanted and other's opinions really didn't matter (I'm 35). You're only 19; learn this now and live a fcking dope life! YOU ROCK!
Moving out isn't an option...but thanks.
Maybe you can't move out today or in a week but maybe in a few months or a year... most limitations are only in the mind. What you want is possible.
My identity is shitty which is my relationship with reality is worse. I wish I could communicate what I meant.

Making a "good" choice and setting a "healthy boundary" has left me feeling like i've hacked half a limb off.
Why does trying to do the "right" thing always backfire so painfully?
My life feels pointless because everything is on pause because of covid. I wish we could go back to the way things were before

Same here, I actually just thought about this all day during a deep self reflection. I’ve been depressed for 3 years, just about when the pandemic started. Having everything on pause, had me feeling pointless as well and idle waiting for the world to return to normal. Now I’m still just as depressed, but full fledged addiction has taken over. I get no pleasure out of anything other than chasing the high. I wish it weren’t like this, I “wish I could just stop” like everyone suggests.
Everyone hates me. So idk why I should keep going. This is too damn hard.

I haven’t talked to someone with so much substance for so long. I feel like every conversation I make with other people is just surface level and shallow.
I feel so isolated from everyone else.
I'm curious (if you want to share), is this because you are isolated or some other reason?

Mm, not really. I’m always around people. My work is client facing as well.
The isolation feels pronounced in nuanced way, iykwim.  I think the best way to describe it is being in a sea of people who knows you, but do not understand you.
I isolate but I definitely get you on the feeling of not being understood.
That doesn’t mean it will be that way forever. Hang in there buddy
Thank you, kind stranger.
any mental health groups in Philly? ❤️‍🩹
Everything seems to be getting more and more overwhelming.
Everytime I masturbate my mom just knows (smell on clothes, etc.) and she makes me hurt myself sexually. And I keep giving in every time. Shit is depressing and nothing works fml (I'm a guy btw)
Its been a long time since I've wanted to die as much as I do now
I've been feeling worse than I have in a long time. just being awake is becoming unbearable. I don't know what to do.
Does anything make you feel better or help a little?
I don't understand why I can't get even the simplest of things to go right. Online shopping to try make myself feel better just results in my packages getting stolen or lost. Like of course.
I feel like Peter Gibbons in office space before he is hypnotized. It seems like each day is worse than the day before, which means that every day is the worst day of my life

Every time when I thought I felt better there always be someone says something to make me that I'm in the real world and social interaction can't be avoided. I should get my hope up if I don't hope in the first place then nothing can crush my hope, if I don't get better I won't feel even more worst so I cut myself to remind myself that I do have a choice.
Time is not waiting, if I want to do it, do it now. Today.

My relationship with reality suffers because of my identity. Its just cause and effect. But from a scientific perspective im not likely to change. Idk what it is if my reddit posts or whatever my behaviors in general.  I'm basically in a work loop. So I mean it kinda does suck, I think im being fair in saying as much.

It’s been a year since I was in residential treatment (actually would have been in PHP exactly a year ago) but I’m basically still where I was when I was first admitted lol. I considered going back to that program but realized a year later I still have their cookie cutter CBT/DBT curriculums basically memorized and have since started teaching my online friends how to do progressive muscle relaxation, paced breathing, mindfulness, what values are, stuff like that. Anyway I wish I had a more concrete plan for what I’m doing next but for now it’s just therapy every week as usual and trying to keep myself alive. Whoopie.
Oh, and now I’m having cardiac issues and god only knows why. It might be because of medications I tried recently on top of the medications I’ve been taking since I was a kid…feels like I’ve been punished for trying to feel better. Funny part is that the concept of having a heart attack or a stroke (obviously this is my anxiety thinking up the worst case scenario) and dying is actually terrifying and I desperately do not want this. How very ironic and annoying. Further proof that depression is bullshit and the void in my brain is more of an emo teenager than an the supervillain it makes itself out to be.
That should feel comforting but it actually makes me feel week. Like a grown adult getting beat up by a teenager. And to further add onto the irony is that one of the reasons I quit my job at the high school was because I was intimidated by the teenagers. Good lord lol. If god was real he certainly would have had a great and sadistic sense of humor.
Honestly everything is just pointless, I just find shit to keep me busy till I die

2022 was overall a pretty great year but I seem to be slipping back to depression. Just losing my motivation and can't do shit other than sitting on my ass and playing video games - don't even feel like going to the gym which has been the one habit I've kept up for years. Have to get out of this rut

my mood journaling turned into how much i want to kill myself bc i logged every shit thing my mom has said to me in this week alone about how i’m ugly and useless. and i literally went to grad school to not be able to find a fucking job, and so i can’t move out and all of this makes me wanna die bc life isn’t worth living anymore

Not sure if this pertains to you but…I try to set a time limit to my journaling otherwise I start “ruminating onto paper” and feel worse instead of better. Sometimes I ignore the time limit anyways but…I figure if I can stop myself from writing more some of the time that’s better than ruining the concept of journaling for myself entirely
yea i could try, i ultimately try to write like a page max (small notebook lol) but even then it’s not always great
Congrats on finishing grad school. Im proud of you
thanks 😭😭 i don’t feel great still but trying to exist
The transition from school to work is a really tough one, give yourself credit, you’re working at it!

This is one of those days, man.  One of those days.
I'm just a woman.  I have no voice.  What I say doesn't matter.
So why don't I take that gun out of the cabinet and just shoot my brains out?  Seriously, what the fuck does it matter if I'm here?  Because it doesn't.  I'm in one of those I-want-to-kill-myself-right-fucking-now moods.
You matter

Dude/tte, thank you for taking the time to respond to me.
I get these intense dark moments in time.  I endure it, let it pass, write a childish rant on the internet, and move forward.
Still, to know that someone heard me means more than you know.
Thank you.  You matter too.
Thanks, I’m really glad that you’re okay. Life is intense isn’t it. Or “emotionally abusive” as Taylor Swift would call it! But we get through it. And I see you :)
I’m constantly tired and beginning to think I have a medical problem
I can’t enjoy anything. Everything I’ve done so far have left me empty and numb. I am so tired

Hey everyone. I’ve been having a rough bought at life recently. Just today I got pulled for a speeding ticket ($77)(34 in a 25) with a minor in possession of beer (brothers cooler he left in the back of my car). My mom has been denied her insurance for her surgery to remove bacteria from her lungs. Our family farm is being auctioned off by the bank and I will likely inherit the debt from it. My grades are slipping, I’m working nonstop, and my anxiety medicine hasn’t been helping any of this. I’d really love some encouragement from the community. Love you guys.
Anybody going through that would be at their wits end, add depression to the mix and that’s a recipe for emotional exhaustion/hopelessness/etc. Hang in there bro.
Thanks bro <3
20+ more years of this? Its so difficult to fail over and over. How many more years will I just lose to depression? X
I feel this. I’m in my 20s and the concept of living into my 80s or 90s is terrifying.
Had a really rough week. I just want to stop existing, so I wouldn't be a burden anymore.
I've been getting moments were my mental illness brings me down back to earth. I think it happens during the seasonal change, how do i combat this?

Force fed algorithms are the worst recent casual technological advancement im aware of. 
Theres good potential but so far its just been mostly psychological torment that these companies refuse to spare me from.
I've liked two dozen videos about hating algorithms but I dont get anything like that recommended. 
But I will get something negative about me based purely on subjective stereotypes.

Yuuup. I’m waiting to see more research come out about people with mental illnesses and online echo chambers and algorithms. On one hand I’m addicted to tech because it’s easy dopamine and sometimes serotonin (certain creators who are very positive and whom I’ve felt pseudo-connected to for a long time). On the other hand sometimes the stuff I do see actually makes me feel so much worse lol. Every news post just reinforcing my negative core beliefs about the world and humanity.
I'm surprised how little negative sentiment there is to all this stuff. We're in a small minority it seems.
I’m a mess. I’m different from everyone else. Nothing matters. I don’t care. I want to explode. My head hurts. Please get me out of my misery
Checking in: cant sleep, very upset and lonely. I feel like I am just isolated, hurt, afraid of others and disconnected.

I have been in this sub under a couple other usernames. I was in a bad place during those times, and while I'm still struggling today, I think I'm doing better. Things may never be as easy as I hope, and it may be a long-term progress to cope with and understand my feelings, but I feel more willing to at least try to get out of the hole now. The strange thing is I don't even know what changed; perhaps time was one of the things I needed most.

"It's okay" "I'm okay" "I'm just tired". How long until I can finally stop saying these and be actually okay? I'm tired of convincing myself that I'm okay. I just want to sleep and disappear. I'm exhausted.

Cycle of learning:

 Not knowing what you don’t know.
 Knowing that you don’t know.
 Understanding it intellectually.
 Understanding it emotionally.
 Doing something about it (not doing anything also counts.)
